content_summary: The speaker discusses an experiment where cells are injected with instructions to form an eye, resulting in the creation of a complete eye structure in a tadpole's tail. The injected cells recruit neighboring cells to assist in the process, demonstrating a form of collective intelligence and communication among cells.
